text: Ángelo Roso Neto (born 5 July 1960) is a Brazilian rower. He competed at the 1984 Summer Olympics and the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:Pan American Games medalists in rowing Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Brazil Category:Rowers at the 1987 Pan American Games
title: Ángelo Roso Neto
